title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Why do airports invite fake passengers to test new terminals?
items.description: Airports conduct public trial days where volunteers act as passengers to help make sure everything is truly ready for the big day.
